mapper.select: SELECT member_id, name, id, password, email, phone_number, point, profile_image, created_date, updated_date, status FROM member
SELECT member_id, name, id, password, email, phone_number, point, profile_image, created_date, updated_date, status FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT member_id, name, id, password, email, phone_number, point, profile_image, created_date, updated_date, status FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(member_id, name, id, password, email, phone_number, point, profile_image, created_date, updated_date, status) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{name}, #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{point}, #{profileImage}, #{createdDate}, #{updatedDate}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET status = "inactive" WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
